title: Craig Price (rugby union)
text:
Craig Price (born 22 June 1989) is a Welsh <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. A flanker, he plays club rugby for <a href="Neath%20RFC">Neath RFC</a> having previously played for <a href="Scarlets">Scarlets</a>, <a href="Tonmawr%20RFC">Tonmawr RFC</a> and <a href="Llanelli%20RFC">Llanelli RFC</a>.
He was selected in the <a href="Wales%20national%20rugby%20sevens%20team">Wales Sevens squad</a> for 2012-13 and has played in 19 tournaments.
